Property Documentation

- (NSMutableArray *) filters [read, write, retain]

A list of filters used to match properties for ReservedInstancesOfferings.

For a complete reference to the available filter keys for this operation, see the <a "http://docs.amazonwebservices.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/">Amazon EC2 API reference.

- (NSString *) instanceType [read, write, retain]

The instance type on which the Reserved Instance can be used.

Constraints:
Allowed Values: t1.micro, m1.small, m1.large, m1.xlarge, m2.xlarge, m2.2xlarge, m2.4xlarge, c1.medium, c1.xlarge, cc1.4xlarge, cg1.4xlarge
